verses.roman:
jagadānanda-paṇḍita calilā saba lañā
vyākula hailā sanātana tāṅre vidāya diyā

synonyms: jagadānanda-paṇḍita—Jagadānanda Paṇḍita; calilā—proceeded; saba—all; lañā—taking; vyākula hailā—became very agitated; sanātana—Sanātana Gosvāmī; tāṅre—to him; vidāya diyā—bidding farewell.
translation: Thus Jagadānanda Paṇḍita, bearing all these gifts, started on his journey. Sanātana Gosvāmī, however, was very agitated after bidding him farewell.
